abstract: Winning the Classic has proven to deliver all the spoils that Triple Crown races do - a massive payday, Eclipse awards and lucrative breeding potential.
snippet: Winning the Classic has proven to deliver all the spoils that Triple Crown races do - a massive payday, Eclipse awards and lucrative breeding potential.
lead_paragraph: For decades, all those competing at the highest levels of North American racing have commenced each new year with their sights set on winning the same three races - the Kentucky Derby, the Preakness Stakes and the Belmont Stakes. Victories in these classics significantly raise the stature of horses, jockeys, trainers and owners alike and have a lasting impact on one's legacy, often tipping the scales in one's favor when it's time to be considered for the Hall of Fame.

headline.main: A Fourth Jewel for the Crown, Found in November
